abstract.p: Considering their future characteristics, building a headlamp with white LEDs only might be soon possible. The cost of LEDs' lumens, their low luminance and their huge difference with traditional bulbs as light sources make new optical designs necessary. Projector modules appear to be the best basis for these new systems. Efficient versions, especially fitted to LEDs, which were recently designed and tested, are described.

ref.mixed-citation: Trends in automotive exterior lighting Ron Steen (General Motor) Strategies in Light 2000 -technical sessions On LEDs use and advantages in automotive exterior lighting. This presentation is concerned with signal lamps, but the analysis may be applied to front lighting.

Power LEDs for Automotive Exterior Lighting Georg Bogner, Michael Hiegler, Markus Wicke, Matthias Winter (Osram Opto Semiconductors) SAE technical paper No. 2002-01-0380 Discussion of power LEDs characteristics for automotive exterior lighting, including future use in front lighting.
Luxeon Star Power Light Source technical data Lumileds' publication No. DS23 (2001) Datasheet of the LEDs used in mock-ups.

Projecteur du genre elliptique pour véhicule automobile, susceptible d'émettre un faisceau à coupure de photométrie améliorée Pierre Albou (Valeo) French patent No. 2789475 (priority date: 1999) (German and Japanese equivalents, no English translation) General information on traditional projector headlamps optimized design.
